attributes.action: The choking game adult awareness campaign.
attributes.additional_details:
hools.

Responsible department: Department for Education

I am Asking for help in raising awareness of the choking game amoungst any ADULT that works with children. After numerous deaths in the UK from the game I am calling for awareness to be spread amongst anyone that deals with children on a daily basis eg teachers doctors etc. Numerous deaths are being ruled as suicide as no knowledge of the game is available. Please help step up the world wide campaign and help us educate on the choking game. Education saves lives.
